pageContext.title: DIRTY FILTHY MUGS – All Yobs In
pageContext.content:
Formed in 2008, the Dirty Filthy Mugs were assembled from a collection of seasoned artists who all knew each other from their past bands.

“If you are not yet on the Mugs bandwagon, then what the hell are you waiting for? Go collect all your empties, turn them in for some cash and get your hands on this little bad boy because you will NOT want to stop listening to it!!” “Again, you cannot pass this band up. They are definitely a group to keep an eye on because the music is that good.” –SOUNDSTAGE (Summer, 2010)
